9 RemoteNode::RemoteNode(std::string remote_name, std::string local_name): name_(remote_name), local_name_(local_name)
10 {
11  assert(remote_name != local_name);
12  ros::NodeHandle private_nodeHandle("~");
13 
14  bridge_info_publisher_ = private_nodeHandle.advertise<BridgeInfo>("remotes/"+topicName()+"/bridge_info",1,true);
15 
16  topic_statistics_publisher_ = private_nodeHandle.advertise<TopicStatisticsArray>("remotes/"+topicName()+"/topic_statistics",1,true);
17 }
18 
19 void RemoteNode::update(const Remote& remote_message)
20 {
21  assert(name_ == remote_message.name);
22  for(auto c: remote_message.connections)
23  {
24  auto connection = connections_[c.connection_id];
25  if(!connection)
26  connection = newConnection(c.connection_id, c.host, c.port);
27  connection->setReturnHostAndPort(c.return_host, c.return_port);
28  }
29 }
30 
31 void RemoteNode::update(const BridgeInfo& bridge_info, const SourceInfo& source_info)
32 {
33  bridge_info_publisher_.publish(bridge_info);
34  for(auto remote: bridge_info.remotes)
35  if(remote.name == local_name_)
36  {
37  for(auto connection_info: remote.connections)
38  {
39  auto c = connection(connection_info.connection_id);
40  auto host = connection_info.return_host;
41  if(host.empty())
42  host = source_info.host;
43  auto port = connection_info.return_port;
44  if(port == 0)
45  port = source_info.port;
46  if(!c)
47  c = newConnection(connection_info.connection_id, host, port);
48  if(c)
49  {
50  c->setHostAndPort(host, port);
51  }
52  }
53  if(bridge_info.next_packet_number < next_packet_number_)
54  {
55  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Received next packet number that is less than previous one: " << bridge_info.next_packet_number << " time: " << bridge_info.last_packet_time << " (previous: " << next_packet_number_ << " time: " << last_packet_time_ << ")");
56  if(bridge_info.next_packet_number == 0 || bridge_info.last_packet_time > last_packet_time_)
57  {
58  // Try to detect remote restart of udp_bridge. Assume a reset if next packet number is zero
59  // or if a timestamp for a lower numbered backet is greater than what we last saw for a larger
60  // packet number.
61  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Assuming remote udp_bridge restart");
62  received_packet_times_.clear();
63  resend_request_times_.clear();
64  }
65  }
66  next_packet_number_ = bridge_info.next_packet_number;
67  last_packet_time_ = bridge_info.last_packet_time;
68  }
69 }
70

72 std::string RemoteNode::topicName() const
73 {
74  return topicString(name_);
75 }
76 
77 std::shared_ptr<Connection> RemoteNode::connection(std::string connection_id)
78 {
79  if(connections_.find(connection_id) != connections_.end())
80  return connections_[connection_id];
81  return {};
82 }
83 
84 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Connection> > RemoteNode::connections()
85 {
86  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Connection> > ret;
87  for(auto connection: connections_)
88  if(connection.second)
89  ret.push_back(connection.second);
90  return ret;
91 }
92 
93 std::shared_ptr<Connection> RemoteNode::newConnection(std::string connection_id, std::string host, uint16_t port)
94 {
95  connections_[connection_id] = std::make_shared<Connection>(name_, connection_id, host, port);
96  return connections_[connection_id];
97 }

99 
100 std::vector<uint8_t> RemoteNode::unwrap(std::vector<uint8_t> const &message, const SourceInfo& source_info)
101 {
102  if(message.size() < sizeof(SequencedPacketHeader) || reinterpret_cast<const SequencedPacketHeader*>(message.data())->packet_size != message.size())
103  {
104  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Can't unwrap packet of size " << message.size());
105  if(message.size() >= sizeof(SequencedPacketHeader))
106  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Packet reports size: " << reinterpret_cast<const SequencedPacketHeader*>(message.data())->packet_size);
107  }
108  else
109  {
110  auto packet = reinterpret_cast<const SequencedPacket*>(message.data());
111  bool duplicate = received_packet_times_.find(packet->packet_number) != received_packet_times_.end();
112  auto c = connection(packet->connection_id);
113  if(!c)
114  c = newConnection(packet->connection_id, source_info.host, source_info.port);
115  c->update_last_receive_time(ros::Time::now().toSec(), message.size(), duplicate);
116  if(!duplicate)
117  {
118  received_packet_times_[packet->packet_number] = ros::Time::now();
119  try
120  {
121  return std::vector<uint8_t>(message.begin()+sizeof(SequencedPacketHeader), message.end());
122  }
123  catch(const std::exception& e)
124  {
125  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("problem decoding packet: " << e.what());
126  }
127  }
128  }
129  return {};
130 }

142 void RemoteNode::publishTopicStatistics(const TopicStatisticsArray& statistics)

146 
147 void RemoteNode::clearReceivedPacketTimesBefore(ros::Time time)
148 {
149  std::vector<uint64_t> expired;
150  for(auto pt: received_packet_times_)
151  if(pt.second < time)
152  expired.push_back(pt.first);
153  for(auto e: expired)
154  received_packet_times_.erase(e);
155 
156  expired.clear();
157  for(auto rt: resend_request_times_)
158  if(rt.second < time)
159  expired.push_back(rt.first);
160  for(auto e: expired)
161  resend_request_times_.erase(e);
162 }
163 
164 ResendRequest RemoteNode::getMissingPackets()
165 {
166  ros::Time now = ros::Time::now();
167  if(now.isValid() && !now.isZero())
168  {
169  ros::Time too_old = now - ros::Duration(5.0);
170  clearReceivedPacketTimesBefore(too_old);
171  ros::Time can_resend_time = now - ros::Duration(0.2);
172 
173  std::vector<uint64_t> missing;
174  if(!received_packet_times_.empty())
175  for(auto i = received_packet_times_.begin()->first+1; i < received_packet_times_.rbegin()->first; i++)
176  if(received_packet_times_.find(i) == received_packet_times_.end())
177  missing.push_back(i);
178  ResendRequest rr;
179  for(auto m: missing)
180  {
181  if(resend_request_times_[m] < can_resend_time)
182  {
183  rr.missing_packets.push_back(m);
184  resend_request_times_[m] = now;
185  }
186  }
187  return rr;
188  }
189  return {};
190 }
